content:
I have successfully harvested 10 additional coal, bringing my total coal inventory to 20. 

Now that I have a sufficient amount of coal, I can focus on ensuring I have enough iron plates for crafting. Since the stone furnace is still smelting iron ore, I should check how many iron plates have been produced so far.

I will inspect the inventory of the furnace to see how many iron plates are available. If I have enough, I can proceed to craft new entities. If not, I may need to wait a bit longer or gather more iron ore. 

Let's check the furnace inventory now.
